text: Bhagirathi Majhi (1 February 1954 - 2 November 2020) was an Indian politician. He was born in Murumdihi, Mayurbhanj. He was a member of the Bharatiya Janata Party. He was a Member of the Parliament of India representing Orissa in the Rajya Sabha from 2006 to 2010. Majhi died on 2 November 2020 in Bhubaneswar, Odisha from COVID-19 at the age of 66.Former Rajya Sabha MP Bhagirathi Majhi Passes Away ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile on Rajya Sabha website Category:1954 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Odisha Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in India Category:Members of the Rajya Sabha
title: Bhagirathi Majhi
